statements: DELETE FROM employee_performance_data WHERE employee_id = 100 AND team_id = 1;
DELETE FROM employee_performance_data WHERE productivity_score > 80 AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 100 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE performance_score > 8.0 AND employee_name LIKE '%Smith%';
DELETE FROM performance_data WHERE employee_id = 102 AND productivity_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 100 AND hire_date<= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM performance_data WHERE productivity_score < 70 AND performance_date>'2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM performance_ratings WHERE employee_id = 201 AND rating_value < 3;
DELETE FROM performance_ratings WHERE rating_id IN (SELECT rating_id FROM performance_ratings WHERE rating_value < 3);
